hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
bosh -n target <%= @vars['inner_bosh']['director_ip'] %> bosh -n login <%= @vars['inner_bosh']['user'] %> <%= @vars['inner_bosh']['pass'] %>
read STEMCELL_NAME STEMCELL_VERSION <<<$(cat $WORKSPACE/config/stemcell_version.txt) read CF_RELEASE_NAME CF_RELEASE_VERSION <<<$(cat $WORKSPACE/config/contrib_services_release_version.txt) export STEMCELL_NAME export STEMCELL_VERSION export CF_RELEASE_NAME export CF_RELEASE_VERSION export MANIFEST_TEMPLATE=cloudfoundry-services/cf-ci.yml.erb export MANIFEST_FINAL=cloudfoundry-services/cf.yml export INNER_BOSH_UUID=$(bosh status | grep UUID | awk '{print $2}') export CC_IP=<%= @vars['cloud_controller']['ip'] %> export CC_ROOT_DOMAIN=<%= @vars['cloud_controller']['root_domain'] %> export CF_PROTOCOL=<%= @vars['cloud_controller']['protocol'] %>
export GOPATH=~/go export PATH=~/go/bin:/usr/local/go/bin:$PATH go get -v github.com/cloudfoundry-incubator/spiff
cd $WORKSPACE
<% case @vars['iaas'] when 'openstack' %> export OS_AUTH_URL=<%= @vars['openstack']['auth_url'] %> export OS_USERNAME=<%= @vars['openstack']['user'] %> export OS_PASSWORD=<%= @vars['openstack']['api_key'] %> export OS_TENANT=<%= @vars['openstack']['tenant'] %> <% when 'vsphere' %> <% end %>
./cloudfoundry-services/generate_manifest.sh <%= @vars['iaas'] %> <%= @vars['spiff_templates']['cf_services_contrib'] %> >> $WORKSPACE/$MANIFEST_TEMPLATE
export SUB_VARS="<% director_uuid = ENV['INNER_BOSH_UUID'] protocol = ENV['CF_PROTOCOL'] contrib_release_name = ENV['CF_RELEASE_NAME'] contrib_release_version = ENV['CF_RELEASE_VERSION'] ip_address = ENV['CC_IP'] common_password = 'c1oudc0wc1oudc0w' root_domain = ENV['CC_ROOT_DOMAIN'] deployment_name = '<%= @vars['cf_services_contrib']['deployment_name'] %>' cf_deployment_name = '<%= @vars['cf_deploy']['deployment_name'] %>' bosh_root_domain = '<%= @vars['inner_bosh']['root_domain'] %>' stemcell_name = ENV['STEMCELL_NAME'] stemcell_version = ENV['STEMCELL_VERSION'] %>"
echo -e "${SUB_VARS}\n$(cat $WORKSPACE/$MANIFEST_TEMPLATE)" > $WORKSPACE/$MANIFEST_TEMPLATE
rake manifest:prepare["${MANIFEST_TEMPLATE}","${MANIFEST_TEMPLATE}.stage2"]
./multisite.rb ${MANIFEST_TEMPLATE}.stage2 > $WORKSPACE/${MANIFEST_FINAL}
bosh -n deployment $WORKSPACE/${MANIFEST_FINAL} bosh -n deploy
